title: Hour 3 - Bob Nightengale and Matt Ryan (07-31-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bob Nightengale and Matt Ryan (07-31-20)
description:
Bob Nightengale tells Dan that major league baseball does not seem to know what is going on with the Marlins. Bob said that is is believed that the Marlins contracted the covid virus while in Atlanta; but no one knows if it was the team that went out or a specific player. Matt Ryan tells Dan that he could not believe it when he heard that Tom Brady was coming to his conference. Matt says he is still not in a good enough place to talk about that Super bowl loss yet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Bob Nightengale tells Dan that major league baseball does not seem to know what is going on with the Marlins. Bob said that is is believed that the Marlins contracted the covid virus while in Atlanta; but no one knows if it was the team that went out or a specific player. Matt Ryan tells Dan that he could not believe it when he heard that Tom Brady was coming to his conference. Matt says he is still not in a good enough place to talk about that Super bowl loss yet.
